Package trading

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
trading.Bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bidder
public class Bot extends Object implements Bidder
Represents a trading bot that can place bids based on various strategies.

      public Bot()
      Default constructor. Initializes bot with a mixed strategy.

      Returns the state of the player/bot.

      Returns:

      public String getStrategyName()
      Returns the name of the strategy the bot is using.
      Returns:
      The simple name of the strategy class.

    • init

      public void init(int quantity, int cash)
      Initializes the bot with the given quantity and cash. Also initializes the strategy to be used.
      Specified by:
      init in interface Bidder
      Parameters:
      quantity - Quantity available for bidding.
      cash - Initial cash for the bot.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided quantity or cash is negative.

    • placeBid

      public int placeBid()
      Determines and places a bid based on the bot's strategy. Ensures the bid is valid before returning.
      Specified by:
      placeBid in interface Bidder
      Returns:
      The bid amount.

    • bids

      public void bids(int own, int other)
      Processes the bids of both players and updates their states accordingly.
      Specified by:
      bids in interface Bidder
      Parameters:
      own - The bid of the current bot.
      other - The bid of the other player.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided bids are negative.
